ComicInfo.Summary:
Harlan Ellison's Dream Corridor is a comic book series published by Dark Horse Comics. All of the stories are adapted from works originally written by Harlan Ellison. Each issue includes many pages of interstitial sequencing written by Ellison, drawn by Eric Shanower, and a new short story by Ellison, written around the cover of each issue.
*Story Titles* Chatting With Anubis (prose) by Ellison I Hove No Mouth, And I Must Scream part 4 (prose) by Ellison I Have No Mouth, And I Must Scream by John Byrne Cold Friend by Jones and Lapham Catman part 1 by David and Deodato Jr.
https://comicvine.gamespot.com/harlan-ellisons-dream-corridor-4-harlan-ellisons-d/4000-249536/
